biography_text: WILD, Susan, a Representative from Pennsylvania; born on June 7, 1957; B.A., American University, Washington, D.C., 1978; J.D., George Washington University, 1982; lawyer, private practice; solicitor, Allentown, Pa., 2015-2018; elected simultaneously as a Democrat to the One Hundred Fifteenth and the One Hundred Sixteenth Congresses, by special election, to fill the vacancy caused by the resignation of United States Representative Charles W. Dent (November 6, 2018-present).
